text: What was really surprising was that Twoflower was wearing new clothes and they did itch, but that was about all you could say. #ColourOfMagic

passages.fragment: What was really surprising was that Twoflower was wearing new clothes

passages.full_quote: Of course, he <used>was wearing new clothes and they did itch, but that was</used>n't the problem

passages.fragment: , but that was about all you could say
passages.full_quote: Technically he had arms, because his hands were attached to his shoulders<used>, but that was about all you could say</used>
